Title: Day 5: 2:00 P.M. - 3:00 P.M.
Plot:
Jack poses as Rossler and manages to trace one of the canisters of nerve gas, but he goes against orders from the president when the terrorists target a shopping mall. 

Logan and Martha quarrel when she learns of her husband's intention to cover up the real reason for Walt's suicide.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Herman Chaves,  Jay Gordon,  Timothy Omundson,  Alla Korot
